name: 涅槃之路
description: You are in a strange world, and if you want to leave, you have to go ahead and fight until you become strong enough to reach the last level to open the door. Keep fighting, winning, strengthening yourself with rewards, hitting all kinds of opponents, the most important thing is to keep trying.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS:  Processor:  Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card:
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
